The Bison is a majestic mammal that roams the grassy plains of North America. It measures 6 feet (1.8 meters) tall and weighs 2,000 pounds (900 kilograms). With its shaggy fur, sharp horns, and massive bulk, the Bison is an impressive sight to behold. This iconic animal has played an important role in the history and culture of the American West, and is a symbol of strength, endurance, and freedom. Whether you're a wildlife enthusiast or simply drawn to the rugged beauty of the frontier, the Bison is a creature that commands respect and admiration.
